headline: Cardinal Health (CAH): Reviewing Valuation After a Strong Multi‑Year Rally and Recent Share Price Pullback
summary: Cardinal Health (CAH) has been on a strong multi year run, and the recent pullback appears more like a pause than a reversal, given its steady revenue and earnings growth. See our latest analysis for Cardinal Health. At around $198.83 per share, recent weakness, including a 7 day share price return of minus 6.33 percent, sits against a powerful backdrop. There is a roughly 68 percent year to date share price return and a 5 year total shareholder return above 300 percent that still points to...
